space.arim.api.chat

Class JsonMessageBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • space.arim.api.chat.JsonMessageBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageBuilder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Message.JsonBuilder

    public class JsonMessageBuilder
extends Object
    Helper class for creating Messages using JsonComponent.
    Author:
    A248

      • cleanBuild

        public Message cleanBuild()
        Builds into a fresh Message, but uses Component objects instead of JsonComponent objects where possible.

        All JsonComponent objects without any JSON features are changed to regular Component objects.

        If built normally with build(), the result may contain a Component without any tooltips, urls, commands, suggestions, or insertions.
        However, programmers may not want Message whose Component array contains JsonComponent objects without any JSON features enabled, since this conveys the false impression that some JSON features are enabled in the Component (since it is a JsonComponent).
        Accordingly, this method is provided to change JsonComponent objects with no JSON in them to regular Component objects prior to building.
        Returns:
        a formed Message with JsonComponent objects converted to regular Component objects where possible

      • build

        public Message build()
        Description copied from interface: MessageBuilder
        Builds into a fresh Message
        Returns:
        a formed Message
